metadata.title: CVE-2023-26242 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: afu_mmio_region_get_by_offset in drivers/fpga/dfl-afu-region.c in the Linuxkernel through 6.1.12 has an integer overflow.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-17').
